explains: adj. 阿拉斯加的；阿拉斯加州的

sentences.en: Alaskan Eskimos believe that every living creature possesses a spirit.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加的爱斯基摩人认为每个活着的动物都有灵魂。

sentences.en: It had been assumed that the ice extended westward from the Alaskan/Canadian mountains to the very edge of the continental shelf, the flat, submerged part of the continent that extends into the ocean.
sentences.cn: 人们过去曾猜测，冰山从阿拉斯加和加拿大山脉向西延伸到大陆架的最边缘，也就是大陆架扁平的、延伸到海洋中的水下大陆那部分。

sentences.en: Frequent hand-washing in my job as a medical technologist and the harsh Alaskan weather combined to give me very dry skin.
sentences.cn: 我在医疗技术人员的工作中经常洗手，加上阿拉斯加的恶劣天气使我的皮肤非常干燥。
